input.sentences: so many great snow sculptures this year at the annual snow sculpture competition . there was a fish face .
the funniest one was the giant toilet .
the winning sculpture though created an entire scene .
output.sentences: The college students were building with snow.
They built a dinosaur out of the snow.
They also built a toilet bowl out of snow.
They used ice to show their Greek Letters.
They created a whole museum of snow creations for others to enjoy.
